name: GoblinGuns - Goblins With Guns!
description:
Arm your goblin in GoblinGuns! The goblin is out of your control - luckily, this goblin likes guns, and you can drop them on the battlefield. A short (5-10 minute) goblin experience.

Created as an entry for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2020 for the theme "Out Of Control."

Controls

-  Click the mouse to drop guns for the goblin,and select menu options
-  Clicking the 🔁Restart button will restart the level
-  Escape will return you to the title screen

Options (Windows downloadable only)
- F8 and F9 - Adjust window size (windowed mode)
- F11 - Toggle fullscreen
- F1 and F2 - Lower and raise music volume
- F3 and F4 - Lower and raise sound effects volume

Tips
-  This Goblin loves guns, and will only move if it sees gun
- Some guns take longer to aim than others
- If the Goblin cannot shoot another Goblin, it will simply shoot wherever it pleases
- If you get stuck, you can press Control + < or Control + > to goblin skip to the previous/next levels

Completion stats

- Jam Length - 48 Hours (11 Jul - 13 Jul 2020)
- Development Length - ~36hours

SFX Content packs used - All SFX have been composited and/or modified from their original sources, and were from the following free/royalty-free sources;

  • Soniss GDC Game Audio Bundle #1 (2015) , alternative link here
  • Soniss GDC Game Audio Bundle #2 (2016)
  • Soniss GDC Game Audio Bundle #3 (2017)
  • Sonniss GDC Game Audio Bundle #4 (2018)

Music created in Logic Pro. The track "Goblin Mode" also available on Soundcloud
